name: cleverage/encryption-bundle
description: The EncryptionBundle allows you to store encrypted files and data in Doctrine's entity in a very simple way

suggest.doctrine/doctrine-bundle: Use Doctrine to encrypt and decrypt entities automatically
suggest.ext-sodium: The Sodium library is native in PHP 7.2
suggest.ext-mcrypt: Don't use this except for backward compatibility purpose
suggest.paragonie/sodium_compat: Use this for a Sodium polyfill
suggest.phpseclib/mcrypt_compat: If you need backward compatibility but don't want to compile the extension
